医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
外显子组测序揭示了生长障碍的复杂遗传诊断在《儿科杂志》上发表的一篇文章中，巴西的研究人员描述了一名入院的 9 岁男孩的病例，该男孩因多种症状和重叠的情况而导致诊断困难，例如身材矮小、牙釉质薄（牙釉质）发育不全）、中度智力缺陷、言语迟缓、哮喘、血糖轻度改变以及婴儿期反复感染史。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Exome-sequencing-unravels-complex-genic-diagnoses-in-growth-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Exome-sequencing-unravels-complex-genic-diagnoses-in-growth-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f45a7615-8a91-4598-ae2a-597f0632f5e2 Fri, 16 Feb 2024 23:54:10 -0500 Exome sequencing unravels complex genetic diagnoses in growth disorders
释放情人节巧克力的健康益处情人节到了，很多情侣都在庆祝，但对一些人来说，巧克力才是他们的真爱。伊利诺伊大学厄巴纳-香槟分校农业、消费者和环境科学学院 (ACES) 食品科学教授 Elvira de Mejia 研究了黑巧克力、白巧克力、牛奶巧克力甚至情人节巧克力的健康益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Unlocking-the-health-benefits-of-Valentines-Day-chocolates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Unlocking-the-health-benefits-of-Valentines-Day-chocolates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c14fe4be-4ea4-4b43-8df6-347093ddaf36 Fri, 16 Feb 2024 23:47:10 -0500 Unlocking the health benefits of Valentine's Day chocolates
研究人员推出了一种对抗神经退行性疾病的开创性方法由西北大学和威斯康星大学麦迪逊分校领导的研究人员推出了一种开创性的方法，旨在对抗阿尔茨海默病、帕金森病和肌萎缩侧索硬化症（ALS）等神经退行性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Researchers-introduce-a-pioneering-approach-to-combat-neurodogenic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Researchers-introduce-a-pioneering-approach-to-combat-neurodogenic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e48720a-af42-4cf3-a3e6-810992848303 Fri, 16 Feb 2024 23:43:02 -0500 Researchers introduce a pioneering approach to combat neurodegenerative diseases
圣保罗城市负鼠狂犬病引发健康警报据巴西圣保罗州最大的城市之一坎皮纳斯市中心的 Bosque dos Jequitibás 公园发现的一只雌性白耳负鼠 (Didelphis albiventris) 于 2021 年死亡，该负鼠死于狂犬病脑膜脑炎。圣保罗大学 (USP) 和区域参考实验室阿道夫·卢茨研究所 (IAL) 与圣保罗市和坎皮纳斯公共机构附属的卫生专业人员合作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Rabies-in-urban-opossums-signals-health-alert-in-Sao-Paulo.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Rabies-in-urban-opossums-signals-health-alert-in-Sao-Paulo.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1931e1c9-9354-429b-97ba-0d137faca581 Fri, 16 Feb 2024 23:32:08 -0500 Rabies in urban opossums signals health alert in São Paulo
遗传机制保护细菌群落免受病毒威胁就像人类努力度过 COVID-19 大流行一样，细菌细胞也需要保持社交距离来阻止病毒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Genetic-mechanism-shields-bacterial-communities-from-viral-threats.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Genetic-mechanism-shields-bacterial-communities-from-viral-threats.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=248ffebd-f22f-42db-a0be-94e34a11943b Fri, 16 Feb 2024 23:23:50 -0500 Genetic mechanism shields bacterial communities from viral threats
降低风险的乳房切除术可降低 BRCA 变异携带者的乳腺癌发病率和死亡率劳伦斯·布隆伯格护理学院的 Kelly Metcalfe 教授和女子学院医院家族性乳腺癌研究室的研究人员共同领导的一项研究发现，对于携带 BRCA1 或 BRCA2 基因变异的女性，进行降低风险的乳房切除术 (RRM) 可以显着降低风险。降低被诊断患有乳腺癌的风险并降低死亡概率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Risk-reducing-mastectomies-lower-breast-cancer-incidence-and-mortality-in-BRCA-variant-carriers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Risk-reducing-mastectomies-lower-breast-cancer-incidence-and-mortality-in-BRCA-variant-carriers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c303dbb-8892-411e-8790-9030bb6664b0 Fri, 16 Feb 2024 22:54:48 -0500 Risk-reducing mastectomies lower breast cancer incidence and mortality in BRCA variant carriers
优化患有晚期癌症的老年人的化疗标准化疗方案主要基于对相对年轻和健康的患者进行的测试，可能对经常与其他健康问题作斗争的患有癌症的老年人造成更大的伤害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Optimizing-chemotherapy-for-older-adults-with-advanced-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Optimizing-chemotherapy-for-older-adults-with-advanced-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d93c9ee4-70ec-424c-a9ba-09fdda3c9a2f Fri, 16 Feb 2024 22:50:42 -0500 Optimizing chemotherapy for older adults with advanced cancer
评估预测医院获得性急性肾损伤的机器学习工具医院获得性急性肾损伤 (HA-AKI) 是住院患者的常见并发症，可导致慢性肾脏疾病，并与更长的住院时间、更高的医疗费用和死亡率增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Evaluating-a-machine-learning-tool-for-predicting-hospital-acquired-acute-kidney-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Evaluating-a-machine-learning-tool-for-predicting-hospital-acquired-acute-kidney-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3869c9c-5471-474c-be05-e470a05f9e78 Fri, 16 Feb 2024 22:08:34 -0500 Evaluating a machine learning tool for predicting hospital-acquired acute kidney injury
揭开大脑决策的秘密，为未来提供洞察力圣路易斯华盛顿大学医学院的研究人员发现了人们如何做出涉及获取未来信息的选择的重要线索。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Unlocking-the-brains-decision-making-secrets-for-future-insights.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Unlocking-the-brains-decision-making-secrets-for-future-insights.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f38a5c89-4998-475b-9909-103c1e0ac56c Fri, 16 Feb 2024 21:55:01 -0500 Unlocking the brain's decision-making secrets for future insights
FDA 根据 NIH 研究批准奥马珠单抗用于治疗食物过敏反应今天，美国食品和药物管理局批准了单克隆抗体奥马珠单抗（Xolair）的补充生物制剂许可证，突显了美国国立卫生研究院支持的研究的重要作用，这些研究支撑了 FDA 的决定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/FDA-approves-omalizumab-for-food-allergy-reactions-based-on-NIH-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/FDA-approves-omalizumab-for-food-allergy-reactions-based-on-NIH-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3fd7dc4b-778f-4b00-8013-ee3408b79156 Fri, 16 Feb 2024 21:41:05 -0500 FDA approves omalizumab for food allergy reactions based on NIH research
